p:
A final decoupling factor analysis was conducted, testing the link between Australia’s ecological footprint and population. Decoupling was observed in 15 of 27 periods between the country’s ecological footprint and population. In the remaining 12 periods, however, these variables exhibited re-coupling. Figure 11 presents the decoupling factor results between Australia’s ecological footprint and population, from 1990 to 2017.Fig. 11
Decoupling factor results of Australia’s ecological footprint and population over 1990–2017
